name: assemble
description: Assembles the outputs of this project.

name: build
description: Assembles and tests this project.

name: buildDependents
description: Assembles and tests this project and all projects that depend on it.

name: buildEnvironment
description: Displays all buildscript dependencies declared in root project 'rewrite-csharp'.

name: buildNeeded
description: Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

name: check
description: Runs all checks.

name: classes
description: Assembles main classes.

name: clean
description: Deletes the build directory.

name: closeAndReleaseSonatypeStagingRepository
description: Closes and releases open staging repository in 'sonatype' Nexus instance.

name: closeAndReleaseStagingRepositories
description: Closes and releases open staging repositories in the following Nexus instance: 'sonatype'

name: closeSonatypeStagingRepository
description: Closes open staging repository in 'sonatype' Nexus instance.

name: closeStagingRepositories
description: Closes open staging repositories in the following Nexus instance: 'sonatype'

name: compileJava
description: Compiles main Java source.

name: compileTestJava
description: Compiles test Java source.

name: components
description: Displays the components produced by root project 'rewrite-csharp'. [deprecated]

name: dependencies
description: Displays all dependencies declared in root project 'rewrite-csharp'.

name: dependencyCheckAggregate
description: Identifies and reports known vulnerabilities (CVEs) in multi-project dependencies.

name: dependencyCheckAnalyze
description: Identifies and reports known vulnerabilities (CVEs) in project dependencies.

name: dependencyCheckPurge
description: Purges the local cache of the NVD.

name: dependencyCheckUpdate
description: Downloads and stores updates from the NVD CVE data feeds.

name: dependencyInsight
description: Displays the insight into a specific dependency in root project 'rewrite-csharp'.

name: dependentComponents
description: Displays the dependent components of components in root project 'rewrite-csharp'. [deprecated]

name: findSonatypeStagingRepository
description: Finds the staging repository for sonatype

name: getTasks
description: Outputs all tasks as formatted JSON into a file

name: help
description: Displays a help message.

name: init
description: Initializes a new Gradle build.

name: initializeSonatypeStagingRepository
description: Initializes the staging repository in 'sonatype' Nexus instance.

name: jar
description: Assembles a jar archive containing the classes of the 'main' feature.

name: javaToolchains
description: Displays the detected java toolchains.

name: javadoc
description: Generates Javadoc API documentation for the 'main' feature.

name: kotlinDslAccessorsReport
description: Prints the Kotlin code for accessing the currently available project extensions and conventions.

name: model
description: Displays the configuration model of root project 'rewrite-csharp'. [deprecated]

name: outgoingVariants
description: Displays the outgoing variants of root project 'rewrite-csharp'.

name: prepare
description: Verifies that the project could be released.

name: processResources
description: Processes main resources.

name: processTestResources
description: Processes test resources.

name: projects
description: Displays the sub-projects of root project 'rewrite-csharp'.

name: properties
description: Displays the properties of root project 'rewrite-csharp'.

name: release
description: Releases this project.

name: releaseSonatypeStagingRepository
description: Releases closed staging repository in 'sonatype' Nexus instance.

name: releaseStagingRepositories
description: Releases open staging repositories in the following Nexus instance: 'sonatype'

name: resolvableConfigurations
description: Displays the configurations that can be resolved in root project 'rewrite-csharp'.

name: retrieveSonatypeStagingProfile
description: Gets and displays a staging profile id for a given repository and package group. This is a diagnostic task to get the value and put it into the NexusRepository configuration closure as stagingProfileId.

name: tasks
description: Displays the tasks runnable from root project 'rewrite-csharp' (some of the displayed tasks may belong to subprojects).

name: test
description: Runs the test suite.

name: testClasses
description: Assembles test classes.

name: updateDaemonJvm
description: Generates or updates the Gradle Daemon JVM criteria.

name: wrapper
description: Generates Gradle wrapper files.
